column1: Minata, kite kite!  This-a man has veh-ry big penis!
Uh, hoh, what an-whoa immense penis-uh!
Wa, wakarimasen, sachoo san. Mondai desu nee.
Attention! Attention!  This isa Chinpokomon Camp!
What is the Primary Main Objective?
Yesuh. Anda what is the Evil Power?  The Evil Power is the United States gorvernment!
United Statesuh government is the Evil Power! It hasa taken Japanese Americans! It hasa broken Japanese spirit! And what do Chinpoko Masters do to Evil Power?!
That isa correct! Now, it isa great honor to present... your Chinpoko Leaduh! Emperor Hirohito!
We will begin witha language anda exercise skills. Hajimete!!
Oh, suh-n nice-a big penis American.
Ooh?  Do not worry. Everything isa okay.
Oh, but-a you have-a such large penis-uh.
Your plane will fly autopilot to Pearl Harbor! When you arrive you will drop many bombs!
